item.title: HTML Basics
item.description:
HTML (HyperText Markup Language) defines the structure of a webpage.
It is used to organize content such as headings, paragraphs, images, and links.

item.title: Styling with CSS
item.description:
CSS (Cascading Style Sheets) is used to style and format web pages.
You can use it to define colors, fonts, layouts, and responsive behavior.
